title: banned for no reason
body: ok so yesterday i was playing yes i was being a little toxic but nothing too over the top, plus it wasnt a ban from the tribunal so it couldnt of been from behabiour issues. Anyway when i tried to logon this morning i got a message saying ''this account has been permanently suspended. Please check the email address associated, i havent recieved an email and im worried im not getting my account back :/ some one help me please

replies.body: i did 4 hours ago, do you know how long it takes them to reply? :)
usually they'll respond within 24 hours but sometimes it takes them a few days
yeah they replied they had to change my ticket to behavioural issues for some reason hope they get back to me soon

>plus it wasnt a ban from the tribunal so it couldnt of been from behabiour issues.

We currently don't have a Tribunal. It's literally impossible to get a punishment from them. Also, "behabiour", lol.

>i havent recieved an email

Are you sure that you've checked the e-mail that you assigned your League of Legends account to?

As Huebo said, you're best off just leaving this as a support ticket. In fact, the guidelines (on the left of every page here) state:

>**DO NOT** post content regarding account suspensions here. [Submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) instead.
